players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm shocked and saddened by Charlie's sudden demise. Let's all work together to find out who did this."

Diana: "I remember Charlie mentioning that he had received some threatening messages recently. We should look into this further and see if anyone else has experienced similar threats."

You: "I remember Charlie mentioning that he had received some threatening messages recently. It's important that we all share any information we have about this, as it could be a crucial piece of the puzzle. Let's work together to ensure that no one else falls victim to such threats."
